clips.phrase_es: Eso era venta sí o sí
clips.phrase_en: That was a sell, no question
clips.context: When Joaquin declares a trade setup is absolutely mandatory

clips.phrase_es: Ya sabéis que estas son las típicas operaciones donde yo le tengo que dar sí o sí
clips.phrase_en: You already know these are the typical trades where I must take them, no choice
clips.context: Classic Joaquin emphasizing mandatory entries at extreme zones

clips.phrase_es: Imagínate que esto es un punto de control de una caída
clips.phrase_en: Imagine this is a point of control of a drop
clips.context: Joaquin explaining the foundational concept of point of control

clips.phrase_es: El retroceso es la condición imprescindible
clips.phrase_en: The retracement is the essential condition
clips.context: Joaquin's core rule: retracement to 38.2 is mandatory to define a valid cycle

clips.phrase_es: Yo no funciono así, no sigo tendencias, lo único que sigo es fractalidad
clips.phrase_en: I don't work like that, I don't follow trends, the only thing I follow is fractality

clips.phrase_es: La fractalidad. Esto es uno de los conceptos más importantes. Y si no se domina, estamos jodidos de cojones
clips.phrase_en: Fractality. This is one of the most important concepts. If you don't master it, we're completely screwed
clips.context: Joaquin's most emphatic statement about fractality being essential

clips.phrase_es: Un dinero que yo tengo establecido como máxima pérdida en mi plan de negocio, tan simple como eso
clips.phrase_en: A fixed amount I've established as maximum loss in my business plan, simple as that
clips.context: Joaquin explaining the business plan concept for risk management

clips.phrase_es: Tu pensamiento es siempre doble dirección
clips.context: Core principle: always think in both directions, never commit to just one

clips.phrase_es: Que entendáis que yo siempre trabajo con doble dirección
clips.phrase_en: Understand that I always work with dual-direction
clips.context: Joaquin's opening statement about why he uses hedging/coverage

clips.phrase_es: Lo que yo no puedo tener es una estrategia de atacar el precio si no tengo una ubicación del mapa. Eso es lo que yo jamás debería de tener
clips.phrase_en: I can never have a strategy to attack price without knowing my location on the map. That's what I should never have
clips.context: Golden rule: always know where you are on the map before any trading strategy

clips.phrase_es: Que venga aquí y tire, que venga aquí y tire. Solo por pura liquidez
clips.phrase_en: Price comes here and bounces, comes here and bounces. Pure liquidity
clips.context: Joaquin showing how price gravitates to liquidity levels

clips.phrase_es: Diferenciar los contextos para diferenciar los lotajes de entrada. Esto es imprescindible
clips.phrase_en: Differentiate contexts to differentiate entry lot sizes. This is essential
clips.context: Joaquin on why context determines position sizing - not patterns

clips.phrase_es: Mi obsesión es tener un colchón que sepa que lo que haga es gratis
clips.phrase_en: My obsession is having a cushion so that whatever I do is free
clips.context: Joaquin on maintaining a profit buffer so new trades are essentially risk-free

clips.phrase_es: Aquí se sacaría un parcial sí o sí
clips.phrase_en: Here you'd take a partial, no question
clips.context: Mandatory partial profit-taking at key levels

clips.phrase_es: Sin duda esto es zona de compra
clips.phrase_en: Without a doubt, this is a buy zone

clips.phrase_es: Cojo las tres posiciones y las pongo en break-even. Que me las va a sacar sí o sí. Todas
clips.phrase_en: I take all three positions and put them at break-even. It's going to hit them all, guaranteed
